Header.title: Stop Paying Dispatchers to Do Data Entry
Header.paragraph: Automate 80% of your driver communication. Drivers text simple commands; your Google Sheet updates instantly. No apps to download. No logins to forget.

Features.title: Dispatchers Drowning in Texts
Features.text: Hundreds of 'Where is my pickup?' messages flooding your phone every single morning.

Features.title: Arguments Over Arrival Times
Features.text: Constant disputes with drivers about detention pay and who said what, when.

Features.title: Safety Incidents Lost in Noise
Features.text: Critical alerts buried under a flood of routine status update messages.

Features.title: 3 Hours a Day Wasted
Features.text: Your dispatchers are acting as human auto-responders instead of finding high-paying freight.

About.paragraph: Our custom automation tool connects truck drivers via SMS to your dispatcher's dashboard in Google Sheets. No apps. No training. Just text commands that work from any phone.
Why2: Real-time fleet status without touching phone
Every text timestamped for detention claims

Services.name: The 'Silent Office' Protocol
Services.text: Filters out routine noise so you only hear about real problems. Dispatchers focus on high-value tasks, not repetitive questions.

Services.name: The 'Red Cell' Safety Alert
Services.text: If a driver texts 'Accident' or 'Flat Tire,' the dashboard turns RED and alerts management immediately. Never miss a critical incident.

Services.name: The 'Forever' Log
Services.text: Every text is timestamped in the sheet. Perfect proof for detention claims, payroll disputes, and compliance audits.

Pricing.headline: Cheaper Than a Single Missed Load
